public Mad_Money(java.lang.String name,

                 int Money_C,
                 java.lang.String image)
Constructor: Constructs a new Mad_Money Card with the given name, message, choice, Money_C and image.
post-condition: Creates and initializes a Mad_Money Card with the given name, message, choice, Money_C and image.

Parameters:
name - the name of the Card
message - the message that the Mad_Money Card contains
choice - the message that the button contains
Money_C - the Money that the player P2 has to pay
image - the Image of the Mad_Money Card

get_card

public void get_card(Player P1,
                     Player P2)
Observer: Charges the player P2 with an amount of money(Money_C), gives it to the Player P1.
post-condition: The Money_C of the card is added to the Money of the player P1 and removed from the Money of the Player P2.

Specified by:
get_card in interface Card
Parameters:
P1 - for the Player who takes the card
P2 - for the other Player
